name: IWA Project
languages: React Native, Java, Kotlin, Docker, Spring Boot, Spring WebFlux, Keycloak, Kafka, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
description: This project is a school project for the 5th year of engineering school at Polytech Montpellier. The aim of the project was to introduce the concept of microservices and to implement a project based on this principle. The project aims to develop a complete application for seasonal job recruiters, candidates and administrators.

name: Industrial Project
languages: Angular, Quarkus, MongoDB, Java, TypeScript, AWS, Firebase
description: The industrial project is a project we had to carry out during our 4th year of engineering school. The aim of this project was to create an application at the request of a customer. Our client, the École Nationale Supérieure de Chimie de Montpellier, asked us to create a board game for their students. The board game is a fun way for students to review their chemistry courses.

name: Mobile Project
description: The Mobile project is a project that we had to do during our 4th year of engineering school. The goal of this project is to create an REST API that will be used by a mobile app on iOS.

name: Data Science Project
languages: Python, PySpark, Pandas, AWS S3, AWS Athena, SQL, Maths
description: Creation of an infographic to answer a question posed by Open Data University: Is the distribution of recharging infrastructures for electric vehicles appropriate in France?
